title: Possible to transfer LoL through a USB from a windows 7 PC to a Windows 8.1 PC?
body: instead of redownloading the file I want to just transfer it through an USB and i was wondering if this is possible and there wouldnt be any compatibility or missing file issues

replies.body: If you use a usb cable to transfer your league files instead of downloading them normally, there's no guarantee that those files wouldn't somehow become corrupted. You can always try, and if the client doesn't function properly you can use our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to repair if needed.
